greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = prime(n)^3 - prime(n) * prime(n^2).
comment: Same as prime(n) * A123914(n). See A123914 for other comments and formulas.
For prime(n) * prime(n^2) - prime(n^3) see A291541.
For PrimePi(n) * PrimePi(n^2) - PrimePi(n)^3 see A291540.
link: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
program: (PARI) a(n) = prime(n)^3 - prime(n) * prime(n^2); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Sep 10 2017
results.author: _Jonathan Sondow_, Aug 25 2017
